issues.message: Grouped elements - verify reading order is correct

recommendations: Add alternative text to all meaningful images. In PowerPoint: Right-click image > Edit Alt Text.
Review reading order using the Selection Pane (Home > Arrange > Selection Pane).
Convert text boxes arranged as tables into real tables for proper structure and accessibility.
reportText:
=== Accessibility Report ===

Document: rvEvolution PPT Master
Date: 2026-01-10T16:58:07.308Z

Found 3 error(s) and 7 warning(s).

--- Errors (must fix) ---
• Image "Grafik 142" is missing alt text
  Slide: 34
  WCAG: 1.1.1

• Image "Grafik 166" is missing alt text
  Slide: 34
  WCAG: 1.1.1

• Image "Grafik 167" is missing alt text
  Slide: 34
  WCAG: 1.1.1

--- Warnings (should fix) ---
• Reading order on slide 9 may be incorrect
